Module com.cs2212.cardbound
Package com.cs2212.cardbound.gameplay

Class CardLogic

java.lang.Object
com.cs2212.cardbound.gameplay.CardLogic
public class CardLogic extends Object
This class deals with all the logic required to get cards into the game, along with calculating damage between any two cards
Since:
3/18/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Abhinav Bhati

  • Method Details

    • generateCardPools

      public static int[] generateCardPools()
      Method that will create a list of integers to decide on which card pool is drawn from 0 represents the damage pool, 1 represents the modifier pool
      Returns:
      a list of 0's or 1's that is 4 numbers long

    • generateCardIndexList

      public static int[] generateCardIndexList(int[] cardPoolChoices)
      Creates a list of integers that represent indices in the card pool CSV
      Parameters:
      cardPoolChoices - This list of integers will be generated by the generateCardPools function
      Returns:
      The list of indices

    • cardDataReader

      public static String[][] cardDataReader(int[] indexList)
      This method will read the card's data from the CSV and create a list that we can use to build the cards
      Parameters:
      indexList - The indexList from the generateIndexList function
      Returns:
      An array of lists that holds all 4 cards, and each of their individual data

    • indexOf

      public static List<Integer> indexOf(int[] indexList, int value)
      A helper method to return the indices of where an element is in the list
      Parameters:
      indexList - Takes a list of integers
      value - The value that is being searched for
      Returns:
      the positions of the value in the list

    • buildCard

      public static void buildCard(Card card, String[] cardData, int locationX, int locationY)
      Load data for new card from cardData array
      Parameters:
      card - the card to be initialized
      cardData - the card data
      locationX - location of the card on the X-axis
      locationY - location of the card on the Y-axis

    • calculateTotalDamage

      public static int calculateTotalDamage(Card cardA, Card cardB)
      This method calculates the damage between the interaction of two cards, in the paramater cardA will always be a damage card whereas cardB can be either
      Parameters:
      cardA - Must be damage card
      cardB - Can be either damage or modifier
      Returns:
      the total damage calculated between the interaction of two cards
